head.name: University of Pennsylvania (Penn) Treebank Tag-set

license.name: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License
This license is granted independent of rights and licenses associated with the source.

head.comment: Codes developed as a synthesis of ftp://ftp.cis.upenn.edu/pub/treebank/doc/tagguide.ps.gz and http://www.comp.leeds.ac.uk/amalgam/tagsets/upenn.html

algorithm.name: Stylesheet to create a TAN file.
Stylesheet to populate a TAN-A file from collections.

feature.name: dollar
feature.desc: Examples: $ -$ --$ A$ C$ HK$ M$ NZ$ S$ U.S.$ US$

feature.name: foreign word
feature.desc: Examples: gemeinschaft hund ich jeux habeas Haementeria Herr K'ang-si vous lutihaw alai je jour objets salutaris fille quibusdam pas trop Monte terram fiche oui corporis ...

feature.name: preposition or conjunction, subordinating
feature.desc: Examples: astride among upon whether out inside pro despite on by throughout below within for towards near behind atop around if like until below next into if beside ...

feature.name: adjective or numeral, ordinal
feature.desc: Examples: third ill-mannered pre-war regrettable oiled calamitous first separable ectoplasmic battery-powered participatory fourth still-to-be-named multilingual multi-disciplinary ...

feature.name: list item marker
feature.desc: Examples: A A. B B. C C. D E F First G H I J K One SP-44001 SP-44002 SP-44005 SP-44007 Second Third Three Two \* a b c d first five four one six three two

feature.name: pre-determiner
feature.desc: Examples: all both half many quite such sure this

feature.name: to, as preposition or infinitive marker
verb, present tense, not 3rd person singular
feature.desc: Examples: predominate wrap resort sue twist spill cure lengthen brush terminate appear tend stray glisten obtain comprise detest tease attract emphasize mold postpone sever return wag ...

feature.name: Wh-adverb
feature.desc: Examples: how however whence whenever where whereby whereever wherein whereof why

rule.assert: Only $ may be tagged as a dollar sign.

rule.report: Nothing marked as punctuation should have word characters.
